alert.note: Alert for Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:30PM EDT until September 08 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL TIOGA AND SOUTHEASTERN TOMPKINS COUNTIES... At 530 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Candor, or 10 miles northwest of Owego, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Caroline, Newark Valley, Candor, Spencer, Lockwood, South Danby, Willseyville, North Spencer, Catatonk, and Speedville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
